website_summaries.verdict: For little tikes into Paw Patrol, these cozy flannel sheets make going to bed fun.
pros: Bright, enticing design beckons little ones to bed
cons: Sheets and pillowcase included, but no comforter or bedspread included

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: First off, these sheets are so vibrant and the characters actually look just like they do in the show! They are SO soft too. But my favorite thing about this set is it portrays Skye on a gender neutral color palette. My son is obsessed with Skye but there is hardly anything with her in it that isn't completely pink and purple. So we love this set and will probably buy another!
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not a breathable fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but so hot to sleep in. I love flannel sheets but these are stifling. Maybe better in winter but it feels like you're wrapped in plastic
customer_reviews.author: allstl

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set but my son says that one of the main characters is missing. I would not know but he keeps looking for the character.
customer_reviews.author: AlinaVIPG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed set. It is soft and comfortable. Have had it for at least a year and have no issues with it so far. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are wonderful! My 2 year old loves them. They wash well and the colors stay true and bright. Fits deep mattresses well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sleepdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Amazingly vivid colors and ver soft sheets. I was really impressed by the quality. These are great sheets, and my son is crazy about them.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Merryweather

customer_reviews.title: Super soft sheets--my 2yr old LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, bright colors, and super soft and comfortable. Buy these without worry, and make your little one happy at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality of the sheet set
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the quality of the sheet set! Our daughter LOVES them which is the main thing to us! Have had no issues with them!
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Horn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Super soft and actually stay on his bed unlike other fitted sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gove

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft! My 3 year old was extremely excited to see these and sleep in his bed.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much softer and better made than I expected based on the price. My kiddo loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Holman-Kursky

customer_reviews.title: Great! Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: Great! Soft and cute. One of the few sets that have both girl pups and boy pups (it's missing Zuma though).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find Paw Patrol items for boys that have Sky on them! She’s my son’s favorite character and he was absolutely thrilled when I gave him these sheets. The sheets themselves are very warm, soft and high quality and I’m extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cambria329

customer_reviews.title: The colors look great, the images are spot on and they also ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these sheets! The colors look great, the images are spot on and they also feel very soft. The top sheet is pretty thick and could act as a blanket/cover in a warmer house.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sheet Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a FANTASTIC sheet set! My 3-year old LOVES Paw Patrol and LOVES this set! I had a to find a set with all of the "Paw Patrollers" (including Skye), and this has her! He is often sad when shirts and other items leave her out. I will most likely end up getting another set since he insists on this one every day, so sheets have been getting washed every week instead of every other. They are soft and fit his twin bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Top blanket is NOT a duvet cover and only has print on one side.
customer_reviews.text: Soft material with good print. One star off for the one side only print on the "blanket". The advertising pictures are inaccurate, as you can NOT fold it over to show anything but a white backside; there must be two separate (top) blankets in the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.text: We love this sheet set. It's bright and colorful and has maintained its vibrant color through over a dozen washes now. It's soft and durable. It fits our twin mattress nicely without having to stretch and pull to get it over the corners. This is a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: No Flannel Too Big, No Blanket Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The underside of the top sheet wasn't very "flannel" feeling, it was not very warm. The other parts (pillow case, bed cover), are true to their description. If you have a cold room better add a light blanket under the top sheet.
customer_reviews.author: hadda.dream

customer_reviews.title: No comforter with this set
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find that this was the sheets only. It appeared to have a bedspread or comforter with it but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: My son was really happy when this came in and we set it up
customer_reviews.text: My son was really happy when this came in and we set it up. Sheets are thin but wasn't a problem as he has another thick comforter but the graphics themselves were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: They're Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson & I LOVE these !!! Durable, High Quality Highly Recommmend
customer_reviews.author: trukinangel60

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES these soft sheets. He gets so excited to go to bed with the Paw Patrol.
customer_reviews.author: Calif21

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and soft
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are great, they are very cute and soft, my 3 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Willams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sheets!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are wonderful. They are just as pictured (and my four-year-old loves the giant Marshall on the one side of the pillow case!), and they are very soft. They fit her twin bed wonderfully, and they're perfect for winter when it's nice to have a little warmth on the bed since my daughter doesn't like blankets. I would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mama

customer_reviews.title: They have this set and a pink set for girls
customer_reviews.text: These cute sheets are nice and soft i got this set and the pink set i love dogs and i use them on my spare bed which is a twin size day bed. Call me a child at heart plus my 8 year old neice loves these sheets when she spends the night at my house and for me like i said im a child at heart love soft blankets and cute puppies..
customer_reviews.author: Danielle DiNenno

product_meta.title: Paw Patrol Chase Twin MicroFiber Flannel Sheets
product_meta.description: Your child will love going to sleep with this soft and snuggly Paw Patrol 3 piece flannel sheet set . It is made of soft polyester microfiber and has a brightly colored design that features everyone's favorite pup pals from the show. This set comes with a 39" by 75" fitted sheet and a 66" by 96" flat sheet. A standard size pillowcase designed to fit a 20" x 26" pillow. All three pieces in this Paw Patrol twin sheet set are machine washable for easy care.
feature_bullets: Paw Patrol Microfiber Flannel Twin Sheets
1- fitted sheet and 1 - flat sheet and 1 standard pillow case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
